creator: 5396700@swin.edu.au
text:
When enabling both mod_include and mod_suexec, the simple server include
line <!--#exec cmd="ls" --> results in suexec exiting with the error
message "too few arguments".  This line executes ok if I recompile without
suexec support.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 8291 ***
creator: takashi.asfbugzilla@tks.st
